title: Oppo Find X: 3 pop-up cameras, no notch
description: Oppo Find X takes a unique approach to fit a big screen in a small frame: it's hidden the entire camera assembly in a motorized, slide-up assembly that pops up and disappears as necessary. Its 6.4-inch OLED display stretches all the way to the top of the phone and curves on the sides, much like Samsung's S9. The Find X is Oppo's first phone to be sold in North America and Europe and should be available very soon.
